Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Quote from: allwithpassion on April 15, 2018, 06:18:11 AM Any details on the team members?   TEAM  Ami Lebendiker  Founding Partner of Mango Startups.  +5 years at Google San Francisco as Hardware Program Manager. Mentor at Google for Entrepreneurs. Extensive experience with blockchain technology startups  Fernando Arriola  Financial Director Mango Startups. +8 years of global investment banking at Wall Street. Worked in several IPOs for the New York Stock Exchange  Joseph Berganza  Software Engineering Lead at Mango Startups. Blockchain developer. Blockchain Developer with experience in Solidity smart contracts, databases, and Ethereum architecture  Alejandro Chernacov  Business Development Lead at Mango Startups  Co-Founder of Virtual Earth. Several years of experience in launching social media, marketing and SEO campaigns for big brands  Elias Simos  Data Scientist at Mango Startups.  Business consultant with a wealth of experience working on projects with artificial intelligence, media and e-commerce companies. He is also a researcher in finance, blockchain tech & cryptocurrencies   Helena Franczak  Community Manager at Mango Startups (Sydney, Australia). Several years of experience in marketing and social media management.  Java and Android Studio developer.   ADVISORS  Marcelo Lebendiker  President ofInvertUP Seed Capital Fund. Founder / CEO of ParqueTec Accelerator. Serial Entrepreneur and Angel investor in +60 companies across a diversified portfolio that has generated 10x return on investment within a year.  Juan Carlos Torrealba   CFO of InvertUP Seed Capital Fund. Founder/General Manager at Crediticia Consortium and Crediticia Valores. Founder Member of the National Stock Exchange Costa Rica. Founder of Max Vending Machines SA  Gabriel Chernacov  Vice President of InvertUP Seed Capital Fund. Founder Partner of Wow Emotions - USA AR/VR Advergame Company. Previously CEO Bell South Peru, General Manager of TeleCable, Director for EPSON Latin America Operations

Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Dear community,  I am hereby forwarding the team's message about the ICO results:  "Now that the ICO is over, we can confirm the final amount raised of 3.3M MNG or 367 ETH.  Unfortunately this does not meet the required Soft Cap of 500 ETH.  This means that the smart contract will now reverse itslef and all transactions. In the next 30 days we will refund investors for the total amount raised.  This means the project is on hold until further notice. We do want to thank you all for your support, this community has been absolutely great!  If you have any questions please reach out to support@mangostartups.com"  I want to thank you all for taking interest in this thread and wish you all the best of luck.  Your departing MangoStartups community manager at Bitcointalk,  Arvin

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: In fact MangoStartups did have a ready-made product and long term activity with InvertUp. Not reaching a soft cap does not make a project a scam. The ICO was running during a down market period and there was hardly any marketing. For the latter the team could be held responsible but not for the first, which could not be forseen. If things go as the CEO communicated to me the investors will be paid back and the bounty participants will still be paid their MNG (though MNG is not of value at this moment). And if these actions are conducted MangoStartups will not be a scam but simply a failure. Even a 'temporary failure' because the project will not be terminated but put on hold, which keeps the possibility theoretically open that in the future it will be given a re-start.

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Main ICO is live! Invest now in Mango Startups  Hey all,  After finishing a successful Pre-ICO, we've already issued more than 3,000,000.00 MNG tokens!! Wow!!  We are extremely excited about the response so far. We continue to work hard towards building the next stage for the fund. Through our ICO, we are producing a highly liquid VC model that works for the investor, as much as it does for the start-ups and the fund itself.  I want to thank again all of you for your support in our mission to revolutionise the startup VC industry.  Don’t forget to join our Telegram community hub and get the latest news and most important updates first! https://t.me/MangoStartups    Now you can invest with NO minimum required.  Invest more than 15 ETH and get 15% bonus now!!  Your investment in Mango Startups is actually empowering dozens of startups and will undoubtedly have a huge impact in the region. Today we are making history!  With respect,  Ami Lebendiker  Managing Director @ Mango StartUps  Please follow us on Twitter and Telegram to have a finger on the pulse!

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Why Invest in Mango Startups?  SCALABLE INTERNATIONAL STARTUPS Mango Startups has its headquarters in Costa Rica, San Francisco and London. This allows us to support and expand the startup portfolio and their products globally.  CLEAR EXIT STRATEGY According to CB, the average time for VCs and Angels to exit via M&A is five years. Mango Tokens offer a clear exit strategy through a bonus distribution or a buyback mechanism. Moreover, through multiple cryptocurrency exchanges Mango Tokens can provide liquidity in the short term.  PROVEN TRACK RECORD All startups currently in the portfolio have been through a rigorous incubation and acceleration process. These startups belong to the 16/17 graduate batch from our accelerators network. All companies in the portfolio have a proven business model, and are currently generating revenue with monthly positive cash flows.  TRANSPARENCY AND COMPLIANCE InvertUP is the 1st seed capital fund enlisted at a national stock exchange in LATAM, providing transparency and compliance with corporate governance international best practices.  MINIMIZE RISK EXPOSURE Investing in startups is inherently risky. Through the multiple VC funds, such as InvertUP, you are minimizing your risk by investing in a diversified Portfolio which includes companies in the following industries: ○ Blockchain technology ○ Smart Contracts ○ VR/AR Advergames ○ Solar energy ○ Biomedical Equipment ○ Fantasy sports Industry ○ Banking Services ○ Video Content ○ Services Marketplace  ACCESSIBILITY TO MULTIPLE INVESTORS We expect many groups of investors to be interested in the ICO, traders (because of high volatility), venture investors (even with small funds), crypto asset holders (to diversify the assets with fiat investments), regular investors (because of liquidity) and fiat investors.  https://www.mangostartups.com/

Author: IndzheborgC
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: How profitability of startups will affect the course of the coin. Is it planned to buy out coins from profits from startups, in what proportion?

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: All net profits of MangoStartups are spent in a buy back mechanism and a bonus system. In the buy back scenario MangoStartups will use their net profit to buy back tokens, which will lead to an increase of value. And in the bonus scenario Mango tokens are distributed to their holders. In either way the Mango token holder benefits from MangoStartups's net profit.

Body: MangoStartups only focusses on Latin America. Latin America is on itself already a vast world to develop economically through investments. And since InvertUp is established in and thus familiar with Latin America focussing on that area is for them the most secure road to succes.

Author: musta5a
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: guys I'm wondering how the whole buyback process would work. If you would buy the tokens back, what would be the profit of investors and based on what price would you do that? I like the project but trying to understand the concept and use of investment

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Thanks for your interest. The MNG (Mango) tokens will be listed at exchanges. Net profits are used to buy back the tokens from the exchanges. Bought back tokens will be burned. So with the volume of MNG tokens decreasing their value and price will increase. Thus investors will be able to sell their MNG tokens with profit.  The process is explained in the whitepaper under chapter 12. There also an example of the process is given. It's all summarized in the infographic below.

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: First ICO backed by a VC Fund in Latin America  There is much talk about new forms of investment, but very little about addressing the issues haunting the investment ecosystem: the shrinking amount of liquidity on the exit, and the length of the illiquidity period. Mango Startups wants to change that, and it is turning to the blockchain as the answer to the liquidity problem.  Today, Mango Startups has announced the launch of the first initial coin offering (ICO) for a VC fund in Latin America.  Continue reading

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: A new article was published by InvertUp's founder and President Marcelo Lebendiker:   How ICOs and Blockchain are reshaping the Traditional Venture Capital Industry  Why is it that we can not find dozens of Unicorns in Emerging Markets and why is it that an angel investor in emerging markets has no real clue on how he will exit the startup investment  It seems that we are dealing in those cases with an act of faith rather than an ROI aproach  Angel investors in Emerging markets are people of Faith …:)  As an angel investor in startup at emerging markets for almost 15 years I find out that there is a reason why we can not have those same results that we are seeing day by day with unicorns in developed countries  It shows up that there is a very strong correlation between dynamics of entrepreneurial ecosystems and capital markets depth . In those countries where we can find a profound capital market, the dynamism of the startup ecosystem is very strong , unicorns , scalable startups , exit strategies etc  In emerging markets were capital markets are very weak we will also see a weak startup ecosystem mainly in regards to risk investment , exit strategies, unicorns, scalabale startups , follow ons etc  ICOs and blockchain technology will change once and forever the Traditional Venture Industry  As a practical example i would suggest to check www.Mangostartups.com , first ICO that is backed by a Seed Capital Fund that invests in Latin American Startups  Through this ICO , investors gain access to a diversified portfolio of actively developed and promising startups in the venture market with a clear exit strategy through wallets and exchanges on blockchain platforms  As I mentioned , Blockchain technology gives a great oportunity to reshape the traditional venture capital industry .  Mangostartups ICO is a game changer in the venture industry allowing clear exit strategies , diversifying risk trough a portfolio aproach investment in a group of startups rather than picking and individual potential winner .  Life is changing !!! Welcome to the new ride in the Venture Industry

Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: In standard only BTC, ETH, LTC and NEO can be used. If it's a considerable investment you could contact the team at support@mangostartups.com to ask for a tailored solution.

Author: cryptobullx
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: IS there any bounty programes?

Author: brjameng
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Above it says about Latin America, does this means that the project will only available for specific location, in this case for Latin America?

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: At this moment Korean translation-moderation is the only bounty vacancy.   On the 18th of February however a Signature Campaign shall be announced. You are invited to stay tuned and participate in that bounty.  Our bounty thread can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2677654

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: Mango Startups welcomes investors from countries all over the world except the US. So not only Latin America. The Mango Startups funds themselves however will, through the seed captial fund InvertUp, be pipelined to investments in startups in Latin America, which is a very interesting growth market.

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: InvertUp and Mango Startups are featured at CoinSpeaker:  Seed Capital Fund InvertUP to Run ICO Campaign in Latin America

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN] MangoStartups - First Decentralized Seed Capital Fund for Latin America
Body: For questions in Russian you can visit the Russian ANN thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2677579
